item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QCDMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9A Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9A Global

Codename: dandelion

Version: V12.0.3.0.QCDMIXM | 10.0

Size: 3.1 GB

MD5: c021b1dc87c68167c4f7e4bd727e5035

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to July 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
